SA15dhkvadnu:576: bhāvād anyaḥ sādhana-arthaḥ. sa pratijñā-vacane api tulya iti
SA15dhkvadnu:578: kevalasya asāmarthyād asādhanatvam iti cet, tat tulyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:579: pakṣa-dharma-vacanasya api iti tad api na sādhana-avayavaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:580: na hi pakṣa-dharma-vacanāt kevalāt pratipatter utpattiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:586: athavā sādhanasya siddher yan na aṅgam asiddho viruddho
SA15dhkvadnu:587: anaikāntiko vā hetvābhāsaḥ. tasya api vacanaṃ vādino
SA15dhkvadnu:590: dṛṣṭāntābhāsasya asādhana-aṅgasya vacanam api vādino nigrahasthānam,

SA15dhkvadnu:594: athavā siddhiḥ sādhanam tad-aṅgaṃ dharmo yasya arthasya
SA15dhkvadnu:597: tad-vyatirekeṇa aparasya apy ajijñāsitasya viśeṣasya śāstra-āśraya-
SA15dhkvadnu:605: yeṣa panna-ādinā bahiḥ prativādinaḥ prāśnikānāṃ ca

SA15dhkvadnu:607: hi kaścid arthaḥ kvacit kriyamāṇa-prasaṅge na prayujyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:608: nairātmyavādinas tu tat-sādhane nṛtya-gīty-āder api tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:610: yathā pratijñā-abhidhāna-pūrvakaṃ kaścit kuryāt. na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:611: ātmā iti vayaṃ bauddhā brūmaḥ. ke bauddhāḥ. ye buddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:612: bhagavataḥ śāsanam abhyupagatāḥ. ko buddho bhagavān.

SA15dhkvadnu:615: kīdṛśaṃ rāṣṭra-pālaṃ nāma nāṭakam iti prasaṅgaṃ kṛtvā

SA15dhkvadnu:625: vyājena sambhavād aniścitatvāc ca. tasmāt pratijñā-vacanam

SA15dhkvadnu:628: ca. sarvaś ca ayaṃ prakāro durmatibhiḥ śaṭhair nyāya-sāmarthyena
SA15dhkvadnu:632: ghoṣaṇam, nityaḥ śabdo anityo vā iti vāde dvādaśa-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:641: iti cet, anyasya apy ajijñāsitasya kiṃ na bhavati. na hi

SA15dhkvadnu:672: eva. na hi tattva-cintāyāṃ kaścic chala-vyavahāraḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:675: na anirākaraṇāt. nirākaraṇaṃ hi tasya anyena parājayaḥ, na
SA15dhkvadnu:678: sādhana-abhāve asaty api pratiyogini bhāvāt. pratiyoginaś ca

SA15dhkvadnu:686: lābha-satkāra-śloka-upārjanaṃ satām ācāraḥ. na api tathā-pravṛttebhyaḥ

SA15dhkvadnu:690: kaścid vijigīṣu-vādo nāma. para-anugraha-pravṛttās tu santo
SA15dhkvadnu:694: tasya eva anuprabodhāya. tad eva nyāya-anusaraṇaṃ satāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:702: api iti vaktavyam. tasmān na jyāyān ayaṃ tattva-rakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:706: para-upatāpa-vidhāne api tattva-apratiṣṭhāpanāt. anyathā api nyāya-
SA15dhkvadnu:711: athavā yo na doṣaḥ sādhanasya tad-bhāve api vādinā sādhayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:716: yathā sādhyatayā aniṣṭo api vādino dharmaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:718: sādhya iti tad-viparyāsena virodha-udbhāvanam. na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:719: ātmā iti tava pratijñā-padayor virodha iti pratijñā-doṣa-udbhāvanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:724: jāty-uttarāṇi ity evam-āder doṣasya udbhāvanam adoṣa-udbhāvanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:725: tasya vādinā doṣa-ābhāsatve prakhyāpite prativādī parājito
SA15dhkvadnu:727: punaḥ sādhane na dvayor ekasya api jaya-parājayau, tattva-
SA15dhkvadnu:730: tasmāj jigīṣatā sva-pakṣaś ca sthāpanīyaḥ para-pakṣaś ca
SA15dhkvadnu:731: nirākartavyaḥ. nirdoṣe sādhana-abhidhāne api vādinaḥ prativādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:741: anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:742: yatra idaṃ yathoktaṃ nigrahasthāna-lakṣaṇaṃ na asti tasya
SA15dhkvadnu:743: nigrahasthānatvam ayuktam iti na uktam asmābhiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:745: nigrahasthānam iti atra bhāṣyakāra-mataṃ dūṣayitvā vārttikakāro
SA15dhkvadnu:746: ayaṃ sthita-pakṣam āha. tam eva brūmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:747: pratidṛṣṭāntasya yo dharmas taṃ yadā sva-dṛṣṭānte
SA15dhkvadnu:748: abhyanujānāti nigṛhīto veditavyaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭaś ca asāv ante ca
SA15dhkvadnu:754: iti brūvan pratipakṣa-vādini sāmānyena pratyavasthite āha
SA15dhkvadnu:755: yadi sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo apy evam astv iti
SA15dhkvadnu:759: kiṃ kṛto anena prakāreṇa pratijñāṃ tyajataḥ pratijñāhānir
SA15dhkvadnu:760: iti. sambhavati hy anyena api prakāreṇa hetu-doṣa-udbhāvana-
SA15dhkvadnu:762: para-pakṣa-upagamaś ca. idam eva ca pratijñāhāneḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:763: pradhānaṃ nimittam evaṃ pratipāditena pratijñā hātavyā
SA15dhkvadnu:765: idaṃ punar asambaddham eva sāmānyaṃ nityam aindriyakam
SA15dhkvadnu:766: ity ukte śabdo apy evam astv iti. kaḥ svastha-ātmā svayam
SA15dhkvadnu:767: aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad iti bruvan sāmānyena
SA15dhkvadnu:769: sāmānyasya api nityasya aindriyakatve apy anitye ghaṭe darśanāt
SA15dhkvadnu:773: evam eva nityaḥ śabda iti vaktavyaṃ jaḍasya
SA15dhkvadnu:775: na ca nitya-sāmānya-upadarśanena tad-dharmaṃ śabde pratipadyamāne
SA15dhkvadnu:777: śabda iti ca vadato nityaḥ śabda ity āñjasaḥ pratipakṣaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:784: pratijñā-antaram pratijñāto artho anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:788: ghaṭo asarvagato anitya eva śabdo apy asarvagato anitya
SA15dhkvadnu:789: iti. etat pratijñā-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ sādhana-sāmarthye
SA15dhkvadnu:790: apy aparijñānāt. sa hi pūrvasyā anityaḥ śabda iti
SA15dhkvadnu:791: pratijñāyāḥ sādhanāya uttarām asarvagataḥ śabda iti pratijñām
SA15dhkvadnu:792: āha. tad-darśanāya tad-artha-nirdeśa ity āha. tad-arthaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:794: nirdeśaḥ. na ca pratijñā pratijñā-antara-sādhane samarthā
SA15dhkvadnu:796: atra api na evam-bruvatā pratijñā-antaraṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:799: hetoḥ sāmānye vṛttyā vyabhicāra udbhāvite asarvagatatve
SA15dhkvadnu:804: yad apy uktaṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya uttarāṃ pratijñām
SA15dhkvadnu:805: āha iti tad apy ayuktam. na hi pratijñā pratijñā-sādhanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:809: syān na sādhya-nirdeśaḥ. udāharaṇa-sādharmya-ādeś ca hetu-lakṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:810: asarvagatve bhāvāt pratijñā-lakṣaṇasya ca abhāvāt, hetutvam
SA15dhkvadnu:812: asambaddhaṃ ca idaṃ pratijñāṃ pratijñā-sādhanāya āha iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:813: yo hi prāk pratijñām uktvā hetu-udāharaṇa-ādikaṃ vaktuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:814: jānāti, sa kiṃcid anukramaṃ sādhanasya jānāty eva hi, jānan
SA15dhkvadnu:816: upādadīta. upādadatā ca anena pratijñā-mātreṇa siddhir
SA15dhkvadnu:818: tataś ca na prāg api hetuṃ brūyāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:824: ekam eva lakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ syāt. na ca evaṃvidhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:825: kaścid vivādeṣu dṛṣṭa-pūrvo vyavahāro yena tad-arthaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:826: yatnaḥ kriyate. na ca bāla-pralāpa-anudiśya śāstraṃ pravartate
SA15dhkvadnu:827: pravṛttau ca kā niṣṭhā teṣām aniṣṭānāt. dṛśyate ca
SA15dhkvadnu:828: viduṣām api na atinirūpaṇād asiddha-abhidhānam iti. vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:830: tasmād iha api yadi nivṛtta-ākāṅkṣe vādini paro anaikāntikatām
SA15dhkvadnu:837: eṣām arthānām apratipādane na bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvanam iti
SA15dhkvadnu:838: na kaścit parājayo abhyupagama-mātreṇa vastu-siddher abhāvāt
SA15dhkvadnu:840: sādhana-abhidhānāt tu jetā api na bhavati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:841: anitya-ākāṅkṣe punar vādini na kaścid doṣo viśeṣaṇa-abhidhānena
SA15dhkvadnu:846: iti hetuḥ, so ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ. etena

SA15dhkvadnu:854: dṛṣṭānta-virodho api vyākhyātaḥ. hetoś ca dṛṣṭānta-ādibhir
SA15dhkvadnu:857: virodhaḥ, yaḥ para-pakṣaṃ sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā vyabhicārayati,

SA15dhkvadnu:903: vṛtteḥ sāmarthyam anyathā dvitīyasya vaiyarthyāt. yadi hi
SA15dhkvadnu:904: tatra apy eka-prayogam antareṇa aparasya prayogo na sambhavet,

SA15dhkvadnu:908: na ca na asty ātmā ity atra kaścit pratijñā-virodhaḥ na asty ātma-

SA15dhkvadnu:912: sarvaṃ pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti, na atra
SA15dhkvadnu:921: iti brūyāt. etena tad-virodhaḥ pratyuktaḥ. dṛṣṭānta-upadarśanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:922: ca etad anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka-anityatvād iti yathā. kvacid
SA15dhkvadnu:926: yadi dṛṣṭānta-prayogaḥ kiṃ ṛjunā eva tat-prayoga-krameṇa
SA15dhkvadnu:927: na prayukto vipratipatti-viṣayaś ca kiṃ na darśita iti cet, na,
SA15dhkvadnu:930: ca. ata eva na pratijñayā hetor bādhanam. na ca ekam
SA15dhkvadnu:931: eva kiṃcin na asti iti bruvāṇaḥ kaścit tat-samuccaya-rūpam

SA15dhkvadnu:933: yo api yugapat ṣaṭkena yogād ity ādinā paramāṇor
SA15dhkvadnu:934: bhedam āha, na tasya apy ekaḥ samuccaya-rūpaḥ sādhayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:935: iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tarhy abhāva eva eka-aneka-pratiṣedhāt. ataḥ so api
SA15dhkvadnu:937: na tatra śabda iti na virodhaḥ.

SA15dhkvadnu:939: yena pṛthag ucyeta. tatra hetu-pratijñāyor bādhanam, iha
SA15dhkvadnu:940: pratijñayā hetor ity asti bheda iti cet,
SA15dhkvadnu:943: dviṣv ity api parasparaṃ bādhakam eka-artha-saṃnidhāv apara-
SA15dhkvadnu:946: api ca ayaṃ viruddho aviruddho vā sati hetu-prayoge vyadhikaraṇatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:948: sa khalu ucyamāna eva atad-dharmatayā pratīto vaktuḥ parājayam
SA15dhkvadnu:951: api ca sarvatra ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ sambhavan
SA15dhkvadnu:952: na dvayīṃ hetu-doṣa-jātim atipatati viruddhatām asiddhatāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:953: ca iti. viruddhatā siddhe hetor dharmiṇi bhāve sādhya-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:956: ekatra asambhavāt. na ca anyathā virodhaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:960: dharmiṇi saṃśayaḥ. tathā sati hetor dharmiṇi bhāva-saṃśaye
SA15dhkvadnu:961: asiddhatā eva hetu-doṣa ity asiddha-viruddhābhyām anyo
SA15dhkvadnu:962: na pratijñayā virodho nāma parājaya-hetuḥ. asiddha-viruddhe
SA15dhkvadnu:963: ca hetv-ābhāsa-vacanād eva ukta iti na pṛthak pratijñā-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:966: cet, syād etat pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti pratijñā-hetū āśritya
SA15dhkvadnu:967: ubhaya-āśrayo bhavati. tatra yadā pratijñā-virodho vivakṣitas
SA15dhkvadnu:970: virodhas tadā viruddho hetur iti. ataḥ pratijñā-virodho hetu-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:971: vā ity adoṣaḥ. tatra hetor udāharaṇaṃ nityaḥ śabda
SA15dhkvadnu:975: ity ādi, pratijñayā hetu-virodha-udāharaṇaṃ na asty eko
SA15dhkvadnu:978: yathoktaṃ prāk. anapekṣe ca kevale svataḥ pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:979: virodhe vivakṣite pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti hetu-grahaṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:980: asambaddham. na ca utpatti-dharmakatvān nityam ity
SA15dhkvadnu:983: hetu-virodhaḥ. iha tu hetunā pratijñā bādhyata iti pratijñā-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:986: yad apy uktam etena pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodha-ādayo api
SA15dhkvadnu:987: vaktavyā bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyena iti tatra api pakṣīkṛta-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:988: viparyayavati dṛṣṭānte virodhaḥ syāt. viruddhe ca dṛṣṭānte
SA15dhkvadnu:990: viruddhas tadā hetv-ābhāsaḥ sādhāraṇāyām aprasādhite vā
SA15dhkvadnu:993: kaścid hetu-doṣo dṛṣṭānta-virodhaś ca pratijñayā iti cet, na,
SA15dhkvadnu:994: tad api saṃśaya-hetutva-anativṛtter dṛṣṭānta-virodho hi pratijñāyāḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:999: api hetor na avyabhicāra-dharmatā śakyā darśayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:1001: tan na pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodho hetv-ābhāsān ativartate.
SA15dhkvadnu:1002: ubhayathā api doṣo astv iti cet,
SA15dhkvadnu:1006: hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ viruddhe dṛṣṭānte na sambhavati iti prāk
SA15dhkvadnu:1007: prayuktasya hetor doṣeṇa parājaya iti na uttara-dṛṣṭānta-apekṣayā
SA15dhkvadnu:1008: virodhaś cintām arhati. hetor api dṛṣṭānta-virodhe asādhāraṇatvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:1009: viruddhatvaṃ vā vaidharmye yadi vṛttiḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:1015: sarva ete sādhana-virodhā hetv-ābhāseṣv eva antarbhavanti
SA15dhkvadnu:1017: yat tu viruddham uttaraṃ para-pakṣe sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:1019: tad asambaddham eva. yadi hi sva-siddhena
SA15dhkvadnu:1021: tasya tat sva-pakṣa-viruddhaṃ na abhimatam iti virodha
SA15dhkvadnu:1022: yujyeta. sa hi svayaṃ pratipanne gotve hetu-vṛtteḥ saṃśayāno
SA15dhkvadnu:1023: apratipattim ātmanas tathā khyāpayati. sa ca hetuḥ
